column2: the food was delicious.  The crunchy shrimp balls tasted like it was coated in rice krispies
column3: which oddly worked.  I enjoyed the aioli sauce that was drizzled on the plate.  The ramen itself was very good too.  After reading rave reviews on the broth
column4: I was a tad disappointed.  It was definitely good
column5: but in my mind it had been hyped up too much.  I added a seasoned egg to my bowl
column6: which I enjoyed.  It was a very filling dish and I wasn't hungry at all until dinner.
